website_summaries.verdict: Although the Hoka One One Mach received many satisfactory reviews, others could not help but compare it in favor of its predecessor, the Clayton. While most of the Mach’s users admired the design and structural elements, and many others found it pleasant to wear, some found faults in the shoe’s fit and feel. Overall, the Mach was a comfortable shoe, but some improvements are necessary for a completely praiseworthy performance.
pros: A couple of runners found the Hoka One One to be a lightweight shoe
Some users were surprised that the underfoot platform saved the knees from tension or discomfort
A satisfied wearer commended the effortless energy return of the Mach
Several reviewers were happy that the shoe did not give them blisters
One user was mostly contented that the arch blisters that they used to get in the Clayton were no longer in the Mach
As claimed by some, the fit was snug but yet able to accommodate a comfortable toe-splay
A lot of wearers gave positive remarks to the forefoot cushioning and responsiveness
Many runners reported a comfortable wear right out of the box
cons: A disappointed user disliked the poor shock absorption of the sole unit
Some wearers felt the Mach had a stiffer cushioning than the Clayton, which was its predecessor
A customer wrote that the mushy underfoot resulted in poor proprioception
The tongue was too thin, according to many users
The ride was neither soft nor bouncy and lacked the “race feeling,” a buyer lamented
Several consumers reported that the fit was too narrow
there wasn’t enough room for the foot to relax

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for folks over 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Hoka ONE ONE makes a SOLID shoe, that are especially designed for folks over 200lbs...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Church

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Feels Gtreat
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. They fit great and feel light as a feather. I’ve got about 50 miles in these shoes ranging from a 2 mile run to a 21 miler. I was a little worried how they’d hold up on the 21 miler, but my feet felt great, none of that sore, throbbing feel you can get on those runs. I bought these shoes for a lightweight shoe I can wear to race marathons and half marathons, and up temp longer runs and I found a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe with lots of cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe with lots of cushioning. Light very comfortable. Soles wore out exceptionally quickly overall a good shoe but short-lived for the price
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Roche

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: Never had a pair of shoes like this. They have the extra cushioning in the heel area which is very helpful and goes a long way to comfort. For folks like me who are walking on hard floors all day and spend 8-12 hours on their feet, you won't be sorry you spent the money on shoes like these.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Size 9M. Light, comfortable, fits perfect. Best running shoes that I own. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Punch

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes, just not a comfortable as my Clifton's. There is not as much cushioning but they are still good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bucher

customer_reviews.title: Hoka:  Reputable Company
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Hoka's and I have yet to be disappointed. The quality of this shoe is durable and at the same time flexible in all the right areas (toe, arch, heel). I use this shoe for my everyday walking and I have already noticed less discomfort in my feet as opposed to Reebok, New Balance, and other brand shoes. I would also recommend if anyone is an active runner, go with the Hoka Cliftons as they have lasted me over a year and I average between 6-9 miles a week. Truly a remarkable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes did not seem as supportive as the last pair of Hoka that I had brought. I did put some soft sol arches in them, and it helped alot. The shoes are very light and breath well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I am 60 years old, and I find that my feet hurt after a week of heavy training. I've tried several shoe brands, and inserts but still have pain. These shoes did the trick for me. While they have great support, the soles and heal offer the best cushioning I've experienced in a running shoe. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mazzolar59

customer_reviews.title: It feels like I'm not wearing them.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. Also the lightest. I can wear them all day and my feet are smiling. I ordered them a 1/2 size larger than I needed just to make sure the length was good.
customer_reviews.author: Auby's Hobbies

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Think they run a little bit large though
customer_reviews.text: I have knee pain that is somewhat did generative. Had a family member recommend these shoes and they seem to be pretty good. Walking around all day does not result in as much pain as I was having before. I do believe that the shoes fit a bit loose in the toe area. Overall a really good product though.
customer_reviews.author: J W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful to your poor tired feet and legs. Standing on concrete is no problem now! I walk with a bounce. Love these! They’re great for my narrow feet as I can lace them tight as I want.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna G. Cook

customer_reviews.title: This shoe in junk, kills my feet to walk in
customer_reviews.text: I has previously purchased a pair of HOKA shoes in July of 2018 for walking. I walk 4 to 6 miles several days a week. When that pair wore out, I ordered this model and they kill my feet. The balls of my feet feel bruised after walking 2 or 3 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Low

customer_reviews.title: PTTD Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I had read in one of the reviews that this version of the HOKA would be good for PTTD (a form of tendonitis). In fact it has been a lifesaver. Between that and the bioskin tri-loc brace it's removed almost all of my pain and has allowed my tendon to really start healing. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting running shoes and after using them once I had my suspicions so I started looking into the shoe little bit more and I found out that it is a walking shoe that I bought not a running shoe. Although they’re good for walking but I needed a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Dale

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These are not like the Bondis I have had previously. Not nearly as much padding. They fit fine, but the price reflects the difference in quality. I will go back to the Bondi.
customer_reviews.author: Walrus

customer_reviews.title: Causes calluses on feet
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months. Overall good shoes, but I would say that just for sort distances (less than 5 miles). Why only 2 stars - calluses on the feet from insoles. Tried many times different socks, lace tantion, even without insoles - rubs calluses already after 4-5 miles. Tried same distances with N*ke or Ad*das - don't have such problem with them. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stas

customer_reviews.title: Great for my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: These have helped with my arch and heel pain tremendously. I have a size 11.5 in women’s. So I often buy men’s shoes at a 10.5. These fit perfectly! Going to have to buy a few more pairs. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars isn't enough for the Hoka One One!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! I only buy Hoka One One's and this is the reason -- they've NEVER let me down, unlike other shoe companies!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. These are worth the money. I love these shoes and will never wear another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He absolutely loves them and he is on his feet all day, nonstop. He doesn't have any foot pain or rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Feel Great
customer_reviews.text: I am a college level teacher needing good foot support. These shoes fit well and support my feet while standing and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: You may have to buy a wider shoe
customer_reviews.text: I now have to buy such a large shoe to accomodate the width. This makes the shoe about 1/2 inch too long but it doesnt affect the overall fit. I really like the extra heel cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and shock absorber.
customer_reviews.text: Need to wear thick socks, edge of shoe hurts my right outside of ankle. There's is enough room. It took a second run before I really enjoyed the shoe. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard. c. Lathem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: My first pair Hoka One that I ran out a bought a second pair. Not the same shoe, no. I can't believe the crappy running shoes I bought for myself in the past. A label hoe I was. Look over comfort. Never again will I buy a name brand. In both pair it feels like I'm walking on air. I have a size 10 flat foot.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sport shoe
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who has foot pain this is the shoe for you. Great cushion sole and a very comfortable fit. I'll buy more of these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light with padding
customer_reviews.text: this shoe was very light, but it still had padding, very comfortable would buy again. Size was true
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes, first pair ever, I will not run in any other shoe from now on... PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: FerTex

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes ever, feels like walking on air, I have foot issues, it solved the problem, well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Micheau

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Two artificial knees the shoes feel good for my weight . I buy shoes every 2 to 3 months before my brother introduced me to hoka shoes. Just purchased my second pair. It will be interesting to see what the lifespan of these two pairs of shoes will be prepared to lower priced shoes
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: The box says fly and I feel like I’m floating on air running in Hokas
customer_reviews.text: Great training shoe and very comfortable. I’ve only ran about 75 miles in them so far to be honest and my runs consist of 7-8 mile runs 3x per week and 5k races while I’m deployed in Kuwait. If you do not like a tight toe box, consider something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for walking or running. Definitely better than other famous brands.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as heck!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has definitely made it so much easier for me to run. Before I was having issues with shin splints and I didn't know what to do. I later heard about these shoes and how they help with the arch in your feet and it was a no brainer to purchase. I've never been so satisfied with a pair of shoes in my life!
customer_reviews.author: marques

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, good arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought a pair of Hoka and absolutely loved the walking on clouds effect of the foam and forward slope. This pair feels like I’m seesawing from toe to heel, aka it has good arch support, but perhaps a little too much for my standard foot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marino

customer_reviews.title: My favorite running shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I put between 20 to 30 miles a week on them and they are holding up very well. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Barber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks better than prior models
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate that this shoe is so comfortable. I purchased another Hoka pair in another color at a sports store to ensure I got the correct size/fit. I recommended it to my friends and at least one has purchased a pair as well. I hope they keep working on making it a better looking shoe too.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Hoka Mach
customer_reviews.text: These shoes just work for me really well. They are light and feel like you can run quick in them. Plan on running in these exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome.. my best running shoes ever. Durable, light weight.. good soles that absorbs shock and easy on your foot and knees. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gayathri

customer_reviews.title: Super soft And durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I run the Grand Canyon in this shoe...it performs on all terrain and never leaves my feet hurting..roomy toe box and the mesh upper is more durable than most of my other trail running shoes...a must have in the shoe Arsenal!👌
customer_reviews.author: Leah Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - this is my 2nd pair. Comfortable and make me feel like I’m walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: David O. M. Assmann

customer_reviews.title: They give great support!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes give great support when walking a lot in a day. They were so good I bought my wife a pair. We both were having hip pain and so far the pain has subsided. Thanks Hoka!!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig McGuirk

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great look and function. Use them as my everyday running shoe
customer_reviews.author: iphoneluv

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe but better options exist
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and decent arch support. But the support on the rear of the shoe is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for running
customer_reviews.text: I think these shows are very comfortable. I’m Just coming off a meniscus tear and the shoes fit great and didn’t bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great brand. Light and comfy. Wish these were in wide. I should have waited to see if a wide version was available.
customer_reviews.author: Sumoshot

customer_reviews.title: Very light shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light and comfortable. It almost seems like the box is empty because they are so light.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: My friend introduced me to the HOKA ONE ONE family a couple years ago when she and I started working out together. These shoes fit as expected, look great, and inspire me to keep on stepping.
customer_reviews.author: Nece

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves these. He had knee surgery and needed the extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Being a Nike head I was nervous but man, I was shocked how great they were!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cloud life
customer_reviews.text: It feels like you are walking on a cloud the whole time!
customer_reviews.author: Cash Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry pair of shoes. Both go crooked on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Goates

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much I bought multiple pairs - the only shoe that seems to help with my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes!!!!!! Run 60 miles a week and there great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The arch of the shoe was a little higher than expected.
customer_reviews.author: fgsp

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I love them, my doctor recommend them after my achilles repair,,,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very light and sole seems better than my Cliton’s, so I’m hoping they hold up longer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Webber

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and they are super comfortable, I have wide feet and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Margarit seamless guttering

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted and quality is above.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeet
customer_reviews.text: They are very light and responsive, but yet have great cushioning for higher mileage.
customer_reviews.author: William Graybill

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Product has clearly been worn before. I’m not happy and would like a refund
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I’ll be getting another pair when I need new exercise shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe once they are broken in
customer_reviews.text: They took a while to break in, but now feels perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered.5 size smaller. My shoe size depends on the width of show. Extremely comfortable and light weight. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: la

product_meta.title: Hoka One One Men's Mach Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Are you looking for a new pair of running shoes? Try these beefed up shoes with lots of cushion from Hoka one one! The black fabric upper gives them a great look while ensuring flexibility. Comfort and breathability are guaranteed thanks to the fabric lining and synthetic insole. You are guaranteed performance, cushioning and grip thanks to the synthetic outer sole.
